description: Progressive mp4 containing the audio CMAF track, video CMAF track and the event message track
notes: The signaled metadata has a duration of 600 seconds, with 2-second segments and slots of 30-seconds every 180-seconds. The Event message track uses the splice insert command from SCTE-35. Alongside the event message track, the progressive MP4 file contains a CMAF video track encoded using AVC, and a CMAF audio track encoded using AAC.
